message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement at $14,000. I understand its value to you is $15,000, and I hope this offer reflects a fair compromise.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. This reflects a fair value for both of us and allows us to close the deal quickly.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your proposal, I would like to suggest a price of $13,500 for the product. This price acknowledges the value you see in it while allowing us to move forward with the transaction.
